entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 3:51AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Periods of Snowfall Continues Through Saturday... The White Mountains, including Eagle and Twelvemile Summits and the southern Yukon Flats, will see periods of snowfall through Saturday. Expect an additional 2 to 5 inches of snowfall. Over the Summits, expect blowing and drifting snowfall as winds gusts from the northeast to 25 mph, increasing to 35 mph Saturday.
entry.cap:areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River; Yukon Flats
